channel.title: the time war on Polar Larp
channel.description: Recent content in the time war on Polar Larp

item.title: The Need for the Chosen One
item.description: The Need for the Chosen One They inform the Chosen One they need a tie here for the Hoyleans might win in the future and come back to this point in time as corrupted Light zealots (this is the reason that Hoyle here was destroyed so easily, the war in the future summoned them all away 3 years ago) The Chosen One can accept the Blessing of Murumbria or deny it.
